title: [HOLD for payment 2024-06-06] CRITICAL: [Actionable Whisper] [$250] After selection an option for a tracked expense, the LHN still shows 'What would you like to do with this expense?'
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Track an expense
2. Select any of the actionable whisper options
3. One done, the actionable whisper and the tracked expense should no longer be in the self-DM

Expected result: Describe what you think should've happened
The LHN should no longer show 'What would you like to do with this expense?', and instead whatever occurred last in the self-DM

Actual result: None
